projects.title: INCLAVI (Inclusive Aviation)
projects.description: INCLAVI addresses skills mismatches in the aviation sector related to the freedom of movement of persons with disabilities and accessibility requirements in line with the EC Strategy for the Rights of Persons with Disabilities 2021-2030. The project accomplishes this through cooperation key global industry and labour market actors combined with HEI and VET consortium. INCLAVI designs a new training curriculum to support the reskilling of aviation sector employees and key target groups who have a role in the passenger journey of PwDs from door to door. The training will address students and professionals in areas of work related to travel agencies, airports, and airlines.

projects.title: Stichting Credit4Cuba
projects.description: Stichting Credit4Cuba is a non-profit foundation, founded in 2015 in the Netherlands by Marije Oosterhek and Dennis Schmidt. The foundation aims to make a difference for small Cuban entrepreneurs - the so called cuentapropistas - and supports small and growing enterprise development in Cuba. We offer network meetings, financial and practical management training, coaching and improved access to finance. We aim to setup an impact hub in Cuba; a social environment where entrepreneurs can meet to exchange experiences and collaborate, creating new opportunities, joining efforts and developing their businesses.

Foundation Carmacal advocates for sustainable development in travel. With CARMACAL, tour operators may measure and manage the carbon footprint aspect of their products in detail. The carbon footprint of flights is specified up to the level of airline and type of plane, CARMACAL is a web-based application with a simple overview screen, enabling product selection by for instance unique codes, product names, countries and product types.
